Source: Hospital Episode Statistics - Admitted Patient Care
Numerator: Admissions to hospital realting to accidental falls
Notes:
Direct Age Standardised Rate (DASR) per 100,000 population.

SQL WHERE clause:
WHERE DIAG_3_CONCAT LIKE '%|W[0-1]%'
AND epistat = 3
AND classpat IN (1,2,5)
AND epiorder = 1
/*(DIAG_3_CONCAT is a concatenation of all 3-character diagnosis fields separated by a |)*/
